title: 16. Call, Apply and Bind
content:
# Call, Apply and Bind


### Definitions 



>  `Call` is a function that helps you change the context of the invoking function. it helps you replace the value of this inside a function with whatever value you want.

- We can extract the function from a class/object
- We can use a separate function that uses `this`
- Arguments passed need to be separated by commaï¼ˆlist items)

> `Apply` is very similar to the call function. The only difference is that in apply you can pass an array as an argument list.

- We can extract the function from a class/object
- We can use a separate function that uses `this`
- Arguments passed need to be an array

>  `Bind` is a function that helps you create another function that you can execute later with the new context of this that is provided.

- The function requires a list of items
